00290 
00291 void
00292 GenericServer::insertRequest( RequestContainer* rc ) {
00293    rc->getRequest()->setOriginator(s_type);
00294    m_requestHandler->insert( rc );
00295 }
00296 
00297 
00298 void 
00299 GenericServer::notifyAnswer() {
00300    m_requestHandler->notifyAnswer();
00301    if ( m_pushService ) {
00302       m_pushServiceHandler->notifyGetPushPacket();
00303    }
00304 }
00305 
00306 
00307 PushPacket* 
00308 GenericServer::getPushPacket( uint32& serviceID, 
00309                               SubscriptionResource*& resource )
00310 {
00311    if ( m_pushService ) {
00312       return m_pushServiceHandler->getPushPacket( serviceID, resource );
00313    } else {
00314       return NULL;
00315    }
00316 }
00317 
00318 
00319 void 
00320 GenericServer::addPushService( PushService* service,
00321                                vector<uint32>& lastUpdateTime ) {
00322    if ( m_pushService ) {
00323       m_pushServiceHandler->addPushService( service, lastUpdateTime );
00324    }
00325 }
00326 
00327 
00328 bool 
00329 GenericServer::removePushService( uint32 serviceID ) {
00330    if ( m_pushService ) {
00331       return m_pushServiceHandler->removePushService( serviceID );
00332    } else {
00333       return false;
00334    }
00335 }

00338 bool 
00339 GenericServer::removePushServiceResource( 
00340    uint32 serviceID, SubscriptionResource& resource )
00341 {
00342    if ( m_pushService ) {
00343       return m_pushServiceHandler->removePushServiceResource(
00344          serviceID, resource );
00345    } else {
00346       return false;
00347    }
00348 }
